repo.name: freecodecamp-project-markdown-previewer
repo.description: Solution to Frontend libraries project to create a markdown previewer

nodes.title: Make things prettier
nodes.bodyText: No CSS has been written so this is pretty much barebones for functionality. Add some styles to put the editor on the left and the previewer on the right. For smaller screens stack them.

nodes.title: Tackle final challenge
nodes.bodyText:
Final challenge from freecodecamp is to make a normal carriage return render a  in the preview. Usual markdown standards is for this to be done with double space. For some reason double space isn't being picked up either by the react-markdown library. Need to correct this and implement the correct functionality.
A suggestion is to build a wrapper for the markdown component to take the children and the ...props. If the child is a string, to a string replacement based on regex ('/n' to '  /n' or something).

repo.name: variable-font
